overview:
Jayne Cortino currently serves as Director of Operations for MMIT.

Jayne earned her Bachelor of Science Degree in Pharmacy at the Philadelphia College of Pharmacy and Science in 1998. Working within the pharmaceutical industry for over 15 years she has a solid background in pharmacy and pharmacy benefit design. She gained early experience serving as a pharmacy technician in both hospital and retail settings while she attended pharmacy school. As a licensed pharmacist, Jayne has held several positions in various practice settings including mail order, industry, home infusion, and community pharmacy. She has served as a managing pharmacist at both AARP and Express Scripts mail order facilities. She transitioned into industry and served as a Medical Information Scientist for AstraZeneca, USA. Ms. Cortino went on to serve as Clinical Pharmacy Manager for the Horsham, PA branch of Home Solutions Infusion Therapy where she was responsible for developing and implementing standardized policies and procedures and overseeing branch operations.

Prior to joining MediMedia last year, Jayne and her husband owned and operated an independent pharmacy in Wrightstown, PA which they sold to CVS Corporation in April 2007.
